== Puthuvype (CT) (628000) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Puthuvype (CT) is a town in the [[Kochi]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 7.06 sq. km. and harbouring 5677 households with total population of 23717 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 275 km. Male population is 11593 and female population is 12124. Scheduled Caste population is 1697 and Scheduled Tribes population is 100. Census Location Code of the town is 628000<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (Population 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 5 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 5 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam north at a distance of 8 km.
